src:
NBA庫里左手骨折 缺戰時間未明

01 Nov 2019, 12:38

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月01日訊】NBA金州勇士31日對戰鳳凰城太陽，勇士主將庫里（Stephen Curry）驚傳左手骨折，據隨隊記者向勇士總管麥爾斯（Bob Myers）求證，麥爾斯指出，會再藉由斷層掃描決定庫里是否需動手術，目前尚無法得知庫里會缺賽多久。


庫里（左）。（Ezra Shaw/Getty Images)

勇士一開賽便遭太陽火力攻擊，第一節結束太陽以43：14大幅領先；第二節勇士頻頻追分，半場結束仍由太陽以72：46握有優勢。賽事進行到第三節，庫里上籃造成中鋒拜恩斯（Aron Baynes）犯規，隨後拜恩斯倒下壓到庫里左手，庫里隨即退場接受檢查，確定為左手骨折。
雖然終場勇士以110：121不敵太陽，差距僅有11分，但在湯普森（Klay Thompson）、魯尼（Kevon Looney）、庫里皆受傷的情況下，戰力可說是極為不妙。
──轉自《大紀元》
（責任編輯：葉萍）
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/01/a102698065.html
text:
Left hand fracture in NBA Curry

01 Nov 2019, 12:38

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 01, 2019] The NBA Golden State Warriors played against the Phoenix Sun on the 31st. The Warriors Lord Stephen Curry shocked his left hand fracture. According to the team reporter to the Warriors Explorer Bob Myers Proof that Miles pointed out that it would be necessary to use tomography to determine whether there is an operation in Curry. It is not yet known how long Curry will be absent.


Curry (left). (Ezra Shaw/Getty Images)

The Warriors were attacked by the Sunfire when they started the race. At the end of the first quarter, the Suns led by 43:14. In the second quarter, the Warriors frequently chased points. At the end of the half, the Suns still had an advantage at 72:46. The game went to the third quarter, Curry layup caused by center Aron Baynes foul, then Bynes fell to Curry left hand, Curry immediately exited for inspection, determined to be a left hand fracture.
Although the final Warriors lost to the Suns at 110:121, the gap was only 11 points, but in the case of Klay Thompson, Kevin Looney, and Curry are injured, the combat power can be said to be extremely bad.
─Transfer from the Epoch Times
(Editor: Ye Ping)
